column5: I just received this site --http://www.realoutdoors.com/EXPOCENTER/default.asp and thought it was a neat idea and about time it came out. Clearly it doesn't begin to include all outfitters, but in these challenging economic times for both customers and outfitters it may be a way to reach prospective clients. I have no connection with the site --- just thought I'd share!
I liked it. Good start at something new.
I've seen things like this before... very interesting idea.
